name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault
display_help: You are able to harness the power of Radiation to crush your foes at range and in close quarters. Radioactive Assault attacks have a chance to inflict the Contaminated state on a target for a moderate amount of time. Powers that deal greater damage, have a longer recharge time and animation time have a greater chance to inflict Contaminated. Hitting Contaminated targets with Neutrino Bolt, Contaminated Strike, Radiation Siphon, X-Ray Beam, Proton Volley and Devastating Blow cause a portion of that power's damage to also hit nearby foes. Radiation Assault attacks primarily deal smashing and energy damage, but this set is also capable of dealing some toxic damage.

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.Neutrino_Bolt
powers.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Bolt can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -7.50% strength to defense for 3s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.Contaminated_Strike
powers.display_help: You charge your fist with harmful radioactive particles and quickly strike your foe dealing Light Energy and Smashing damage as well as reducing their defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Light, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -13.90% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.X-Ray_Beam
powers.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -15.00% strength to defense for 6s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.Electron_Haze
powers.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Close, Moderate Cone DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: -15.00% strength to defense for 8s on target
25.00% chance for 2.1 magnitude knock on target
25.00% chance for 2.1 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.Fusion
powers.display_help: Fusion boosts your damage and chance to hit moderately and also causes your next few attacks to have a 100% chance to inflict Contaminated on your enemies. Recharge: Long

display_info: 42.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.Radiation_Siphon
powers.display_help: You pummel your foe with a deadly smashing attack dealing High Energy and Smashing damage and reducing their defense. Hitting Contaminated targets will also heal you for a large amount of health over 3 seconds and remove the Contaminated effect from the target. However, uncontaminated targets have a moderate chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: High Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -15.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
3 ticks of 68.16 heal over 2.1s on self

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.Atom_Smasher
powers.display_help: You charge up a dangerously unstable amount of radioactive energy into a single fist before driving it into the ground and causing a small explosion. Foes caught in the blast will suffer High Energy and Toxic damage and have their defense reduced. Enemies also have a moderate chance to be disoriented for a short time. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Toxic), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special

display_info: -12.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
25.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 8.94s on target
25.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 4s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.Proton_Volley
powers.display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Radioactive_Assault.Devastating_Blow
powers.display_help: You hammer your foe with a brutal smashing attack charged with a lethal dose of radiation. Your target will suffer Extreme Energy and Smashing damage, will have its defense reduced and will be disoriented for a short time. Devastating Blow has an increased change to critically hit. Affected enemies will be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special

display_info: -20.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 14.9s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 4s on target
